section1.p: We are a start-up company focusing on providing Research and Development services and solutions for customers in the cross-border e-commerce industry. Whether it is customizing an online store with various open resources, or building a distinctive e-commerce platform according to your business characteristics, our rich experience, first-class service, and deep industry resources can help you to be efficient and outstanding completion goal.

service.title: Provide First-class Service To Help Customers Succeed

section1.p: Whether it is personalized online store page customization or personalized e-commerce system customization, we can always provide excellent services to help you achieve your goals efficiently.

section2.subTitle: Online Shop Customization And Traffic Acquisition
section2.p1: Help you customize independent online store systems including Shopify, WooCommerce, and get a professional online store; Help you integrate advertising systems including Tiktok, Google, Facebook, and import traffic as quickly as possible.
section2.p2: We have first-class design capabilities, master SEO skills and principles, and are familiar with the habits of users at home and abroad, and can help you customize a high-quality online store.

section3.subTitle: Overseas Channel Expansion
section3.p1: Through close cooperation with our e-commerce operation, logistics, warehousing and other partners, we provide your products with unique cross-border sales channels, local warehousing and distribution services for overseas buyers, freeing you from tedious affairs and focusing on Provide first-class products.
section3.p2: So far, we have been able to provide you with sales channels and offline warehouse services to the United States, Malaysia, New Zealand, Hong Kong and other places.

section4.subTitle: E-commerce Platform Customization
section4.p1: According to your business characteristics, we can tailor an e-commerce system platform that runs through warehouse logistics and supply chain for you. Manage all businesses in one posture and operate more efficiently.
section4.p2: We have deep industry experience and technical accumulation, and are proficient in the requirements and processes of all aspects of the e-commerce industry, and can customize the most reliable and efficient system for you.

solution.title: Youqu Experience Helps You Directly to Success
solution.p: In the process of serving cross-border e-commerce customers for a long time, we have fully mastered the construction capabilities of some core systems and abstracted them into general solutions, so that we can better serve every customer. In the following solutions, we can Further customization and expansion of the program.

item1.p1: Youqu cloud business e-commerce system solution can provide enterprises with an independent SAAS platform building solution. With it, enterprises can easily have their own online SAAS online store building platform.

about.title: Attentive Service, Pursuit Of Excellence, Openness And Self-Discipline
about.p1: We are a team driven by a sense of purpose and values; we strive to provide first-class service to our clients, strive to surpass ourselves, remain open and work with discipline and diligence.
about.h3-3: Attentive service, pursuit of excellence, openness and self-discipline

section3.p1: We are a distributed team. In addition to the independent office in Nanning/Zhuhai, we also have many remote colleagues. We appreciate colleagues with self-discipline and strive to give maximum freedom to encourage innovation.
section3.p2: As a technology start-up company focusing on serving the cross-border e-commerce industry, we hope to find excellent partners to join us and grow rapidly with us. We are hiring for multiple positions.
section3.p3: Our public requirements for joining colleagues：
section3.li2: Love the Internet industry, what you need is not only a "job", but a "vocation" or more
section3.li3: Full of enthusiasm for research, not satisfied with "knowing the truth", but more keen on "knowing the reason"
section3.li4: Solid foundation, love of learning, willing to embrace change
section3.p4: Feel free to contact us on various recruitment websites.
